thread.title: Mueller said he could issue a Trump subpoena

title: Mueller said he could issue a Trump subpoena
text:
Mueller said he could issue a Trump subpoena 10:38am BST - 01:26
Special Counsel Robert Mueller, in a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump's lawyers in March, raised the possibility of issuing a subpoena for Trump if he declines to talk to investigators in the Russia probe, a former lawyer for the president said on Tuesday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
